name.jp: マッドハッターグローブ(男の子用)

description.en: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.ar: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.br: Luvas do Chapeleiro Maluco para personagens masculinos. Para beber seu chá com elegância!
description.cns: 男性角色疯帽客手套。有了这双神奇的手套，你可以把一个茶杯切成两半！
description.de: Mad Hatter Gloves für männliche Charaktere. Mit diesen fantastischen Handschuhen kannst du eine Teetasse in zwei Hälften schneiden!
description.fi: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.fil: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.fr: Les Gants du Chapelier Fou pour les personnages masculins. Avec ces fabuleux gants, vous pouvez couper une tasse de thé en deux !
description.id: The Mad Hatter's Gloves untuk karakter pria. Dengan sarung tangan yang luar biasa ini, kamu dapat mengiris cangkir teh menjadi dua!
description.it: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.jp: マッドハッターの手袋。これらの素晴らしい手袋で、あなたはティーカップを半分にスライスすることができます！
description.kr: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.nl: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.pl: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.ru: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.sp: Los Guantes del Sombrerero Loco (M). ¡Con estos fabulosos guantes, puedes cortar una taza de té por la mitad!
description.sw: The Mad Hatter's Gloves for male characters. With these fabulous Gloves, you can slice a tea cup in half!
description.th: ถุงมือ Mad Hatter สำหรับตัวละครชาย ด้วยถุงมือที่ยอดเยี่ยมเหล่านี้ คุณสามารถหั่นถ้วยชาได้ครึ่งหนึ่ง!
description.tw: 男用瘋帽匠手套，有了這神話般的手套，可以將茶杯切成兩半！
description.vi: The Mad Hatter's Gloves dành cho các nhân vật nam. Với những chiếc Gloves tuyệt vời này, bạn có thể cắt đôi tách trà!
